Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using the Markdown format. 

[[
## Summary
]]


Status of Lighthouse beacon chain is good, but there's an issue with the 
validator set size being too small for mainnet.


Lighthouse has been upgraded to support 64-bit integers which will be used by 
the Execution Layer (EL) in its upcoming upgrade.


The EL team plans to start testing on devnet soon and expects it to take a few weeks.
